item.title: Advantages of Storage as a Service
item.description:
Affordable, high-bandwidth Wide Area Networks have led to the rise of almost everything as a “service.” Mainframe computers were once centralized and isolated within corporate infrastructures, while PCs functioned as standalone devices with their own software and storage. However, virtualization is changing our understanding of where computing resources should be located. Software as a Service (SaaS) allows users to access familiar desktop tools like word processors, databases, and spreadsheets without the burden of purchasing, installing, and maintaining expensive software...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/advantages-of-storage-as-a-service/
